com.madrobot.ui.widgets

Class DashboardGridLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewGroup
      • com.madrobot.ui.widgets.DashboardGridLayout

  • public class DashboardGridLayout
extends ViewGroup
    Custom layout that arranges children in a grid-like manner, optimizing for even horizontal and vertical whitespace.

    This layout seeks to accomodate all the child widgets in a grid manner
    Layout
    <com.madrobot.ui.widgets.DashboardLayout
    xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="fill_parent" >
    <!-- ... --!>
    <com.madrobot.ui.widgets.DashboardLayout/>

    DashboardLayout with 6 widgets DashboardLayout with 12 widgets

    DashboardLayout with 18 widgets DashboardLayout with 24 widgets

    DashboardLayout with a whole lot more
